alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 12:17PM CDT until May 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Morton affecting Renville and Redwood Counties. .Recent rainfall has contributed to a minor increase in river levels. Flood stage not expected to exceed lower end of minor. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River at Morton. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1200 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 21.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1200 PM CDT Thursday was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.7 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.9 feet on 04/04/2007. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
